text: Sartaj Aziz (; 7 February 1929 - 2 January 2024) was a Pakistani economist and politician. Aziz was born in Mardan, then-British India. Aziz was the Minister of Finance from 1990 to 1993 and 1997 to 1998. He was the National Security Advisor from 2013 to 2015. He also was the Minister for Foreign Affairs from 1998 to 1999 and again from 2013 to 2017. He worked in the government of Nawaz Sharif. Aziz was also a member of the Senate from 1988 to 1999. Aziz died on 2 January 2024 in Islamabad, Pakistan at the age of 94.PML-N leader and former finance minister Sartaj Aziz passes away at 95 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Pakistani politicians Category:Economists
title: Sartaj Aziz
